How this blog starts up

18 Jan 2015

content

  1. Install ruby to Windows OS: Ruby for Windows
  2. Install gem, which is a ruby package manager: Gem
    • Update build tools using its DevKit: fast-stemmer error fixing
  3. Install jekyll: Jekyll
  4. Config Github page: Github Page

Good luck!
